Our Partners
Instruments for ANY genre

Play anywhere and anytime!

The ergonomic profile of the neck and the scale length of 634 mm for playing comfort are based on many years of experience in creating acoustic guitars, and the unique ultra-thin body is perfect for musicians who play both electric guitars and acoustic instruments.

The specially designed frame structure, which imitates the body of the instrument, guarantees excellent comfort when playing while sitting or standing. In addition, the structural frames are removable for compact storage and carrying of the tool in the case. The frame design has a cutout that provides full access to all frets.

Connect your smartphone, laptop or any other audio signal source and play along with your favorite artist or to your own arrangements. Enrich your sound with authentic sound effects of the highest quality, connect headphones for silent sessions - SLG is incredibly rich in functionality, allowing you to enjoy the game even more. But that's not all - the SLG is equipped with an accurate built-in chromatic tuner and can be operated both from batteries and from an external power source!

All our instruments have repair warranty
and free consultation ;)
